remarks: Lemma for ~ cau3 .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-May-2014.)
statement:
cau3lem.1 $e |- Z C_ ZZ $.
cau3lem.2 $e |- ( ta -> ps ) $.
cau3lem.3 $e |- ( ( F ` k ) = ( F ` j ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
cau3lem.4 $e |- ( ( F ` k ) = ( F ` m ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
cau3lem.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ch /\ ps ) -> ( G ` ( ( F ` j ) D ( F ` k ) ) ) = ( G ` ( ( F ` k ) D ( F ` j ) ) ) ) $.
cau3lem.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ th /\ ch ) -> ( G ` ( ( F ` m ) D ( F ` j ) ) ) = ( G ` ( ( F ` j ) D ( F ` m ) ) ) ) $.
cau3lem.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ps /\ th ) /\ ( ch /\ x e. RR ) ) -> ( ( ( G ` ( ( F ` k ) D ( F ` j ) ) ) < ( x / 2 ) /\ ( G ` ( ( F ` j ) D ( F ` m ) ) ) < ( x / 2 ) ) -> ( G ` ( ( F ` k ) D ( F ` m ) ) ) < x ) ) $.
cau3lem $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( ta /\ ( G ` ( ( F ` k ) D ( F ` j ) ) ) < x ) <-> A. x e. RR+ E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( ta /\ A. m e. ( ZZ>= ` k ) ( G ` ( ( F ` k ) D ( F ` m ) ) ) < x ) ) ) $.
